website_summaries.verdict: Another inexpensive option for customers desiring a unique, space-saving active chair.
pros: Available to purchase in a wide variety of colors
Thirteen-inch diameter made specifically for smaller kids' chairs
cons: A few customers report issues with the air plug staying secure

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, I have 2 boys. They are 9 and 6. These seats are amazing. My older son wanted one because my younger son got one also. I got this for my 6 year old because I believe he has ADHD. He struggles to stay seated when it's time to eat, or in class. But with this seat he is able to stay in his seat during meal times, which has almost NEVER happened. He is even able to focus more on class work because he can wiggle around in his seat thanks to this. It's amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and does the job, but the color-ugh!
customer_reviews.text: High quality and really good for Focus and attention. But there’s got to be a better color! Kids with attention issues don’t want to stand out. My child was teased because he was using this. Perhaps more unobtrusive colors to meld better with classroom seats would be a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Someone Now

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for classwork
customer_reviews.text: I have a daughter diagnosed with ADHD. We are always looking for tools and toys that help her with fidgeting. Her school is very accommodating, and she happens to be one of several children with a wiggle seat. We keep one at school and one at home. Perfect for classwork, homework, and sitting at the dinner table.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Schuetze

customer_reviews.title: My son has mild sensory issues that become much more ...
customer_reviews.text: My son has mild sensory issues that become much more problematic when he doesn't get enough exercise. We have had tons of rain the last few months, which meant near-zero physical activity at school as recess has had to be indoors and our school doesn't have a gymnasium for P.E. on rainy days. His teacher complained that he was starving to get hyper in class. We bought the wiggle seat for him so he could squirm around a little in his chair during class, and it has helped keep his energy from building up.
customer_reviews.author: Abtst6

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and it was already inflated properly. It came with a pump in case I wanted to add more air or refill it over time, but I liked the degree to which it was already inflated so it didn't need changing. One side has longer nubs that poke into your backside more than the other side. Both sides can be used, it just depends on your child's preference for how much sensory input is needed. It stays in place on a chair without slipping. And, the best part, it really helps my child focus!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Waiting to see results
customer_reviews.text: I am rating this 4 stars for now based on first impression. It came as described, I am able to inflate and deflate it with no problem at all. We just started using this yesterday so I would like to come back and update the review to see if this helps him with his hyper activeness. My son has not ever been officially diagnosed with ADD or ADHD or anything else. I think he is just a hyper boy. I do have to purchase a foot rest for him because his feet dangle and I read somewhere on here that their feet need to be on a flat surface or else it defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Ciclali

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy.... but came without the pump
customer_reviews.text: My kids were instantly drawn to this cushion. I put it on a chair and didn't tell them about it. They immediately wanted to sit on it on the floor, stand on it, put it on their heads. They haven't had much opportunity to use it for it's intended purpose yet, but it so far it seems to be super sturdy and comfortable. The only thing I just realized is that it didn't come with the pump. I'll need to contact someone regarding that
customer_reviews.author: Quely

customer_reviews.title: Thick plastic, inflates well. Plug doesn't stay well
customer_reviews.text: It is meant for wiggly kids, but 40 lbs of kid can deflate this quickly. The plug for it continues to come out almost every use. I've put some tape over it, but I'd rather not have to. He's not crazy wiggly, but I think the plug just isn't secure enough. On the up side the plastic is thick and the pump works well and it inflates nicely.
customer_reviews.author: EverythingFromAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Great! Helps my daughter focus!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! It's only been a week but so far this really helps my daughter (7yo, 2nd grade) sit still & stay attentive in class. I've noticed that she's getting better grades on some of the quizzes & she says that it helps her think when she's able to wiggle around in her seat. Also, great customer service. I sent an email bc the plug flew out of the cushion & halfway across the room two times on the first day we had it. They sent me a new one & I recieved it 2 days later.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshinemama

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: We have owned 2 of these and they both eventually got a hole. They were nice when they were working. We didn't let the kids use them any other time than when we needed them at school or at home for concentration. The plug on the back also isn't the best which lets it leak a little. Unfortunately, we are not going to buy the brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Stubby

customer_reviews.title: Alternative use
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure, I did not buy this for it’s intended purpose. My 3 year old son is autistic and sensory seeking with his feet. He loves to step on EVERYTHING. This gives him multiple kinds of sensory input, one from the bumpy texture and one from the wiggle the seat gives. He really loves it. He’s happy, I’m happy. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rohim

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered red, the box said red, but the cushion was blue and one piece of the pump was broken and box was damaged
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for wigglers
customer_reviews.text: These have been really helpful for students with extra wiggles. They get some sensory feedback and are able to sit through whole group instruction more easily. With the money!
customer_reviews.author: cara rodman

customer_reviews.title: I don't know how this works, but it does!
customer_reviews.text: My son is constantly moving at the table, standing, sitting, chair sideways, very frustrating! When he uses this seat, he is 90% less fidgety and just as still! I don't know how this works, but it does! He doesn't really like to sit on it, just for his own sensory reasons, so we covered it with a throw blanket. He still prefers not to use it, but when he can't sit still we make him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING A BLESSING
customer_reviews.text: This is AMAZING. My daughter usually doesn’t stay on her chair. Possible adhd the doctors said.( too early to diagnose). Thanks to this seat everything is easier now. She eats all her meals Huge difference for us it worked instantly. I cried and cried and I am crying right now this is a blessing.
customer_reviews.author: MOM OF 4

customer_reviews.title: Good sensory item
customer_reviews.text: So far we really like this product, although we've only used it a couple weeks. I'll come back and update if anything changes. My son is still moving, but in place as opposed to all over the room and spinning in circles.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: May work for some but not mine
customer_reviews.text: This may work for some kids but my ADHD child has done more standing on it than sitting and even when he does sit in it, it doesn’t help his wiggling.
customer_reviews.author: Michele M

customer_reviews.title: Great for wiggly kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter, and sometimes my sons too, wiggles to help with concentration. This allows her to move around while not knocking or tilting the chair and still get her school work done. It has really helped our homeschool day go smoother.
customer_reviews.author: S. Crane

customer_reviews.title: This was recommended to us by our 3 year old daughter's physical ...
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to us by our 3 year old daughter's physical therapist. My daughter has muscular dystrophy and it's tough for her to sit still. This helps her concentrate on other things, besides having to sit still. It's awesome
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty durable
customer_reviews.text: We have a few kids who can't sit still and we got this for one in particular who doesn't like to sit at the table and eat. He didn't like using it, but one of the other kids who is a little older does. Our kids are pretty rough on it, and so far it hasn't lost air or popped even with them jumping and standing on it, although I certainly wouldn't recommend doing that on purpose. It comes with a pump to refill the air, but so far we haven't needed it.
customer_reviews.author: cam

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: Won’t stay inflated. Plug (both of them, because they send 2) keeps falling out. So disappointing for my son (and me).
customer_reviews.author: 1witness

customer_reviews.title: He did the best he's done so far with being able to sit ...
customer_reviews.text: My son took this to preschool for the first time today and I was told it worked! He did the best he's done so far with being able to sit still (sensory processing stuff). Planning on getting another one so we can leave one at school and one at home.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine A. Pudwill

customer_reviews.title: This is a great wiggle seat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wiggle seat. My son has been using it every day in school, for almost two years now, and it’s still in great condition. It has helped him a lot. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: gina1221

customer_reviews.title: Happy mom
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really has trouble staying on task and not daydreaming in class so her teacher suggested this seat. As soon as she started using it her class work improved overnight. I'm happy, she's happy and her teacher is happy.
customer_reviews.author: sperryfamily4

customer_reviews.title: it did not help my son to focus better in school
customer_reviews.text: Sent wrong color, reordered, kept the purple for my daughter. They are now both deflated and just sitting in a closet, it did not help my son to focus better in school. It was worth a try, and every child is different. So this may be a great idea for another child. For my family it was used for about two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Angilina Eckarski

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect! It doesn't take up space and is portable
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for the ball chair for our child to sit in while he does homework. He sits in school all day and know it's hard to ask him to sit some more at home. This was perfect! It doesn't take up space and is portable! (Cheaper than a ball chair too)
customer_reviews.author: J. Churchill

customer_reviews.title: Good for wrigglers!
customer_reviews.text: It seems really thick and good quality. Looks like it will be durable.
customer_reviews.author: AMR

customer_reviews.title: This seat has changed school for the better (and supper-time)
customer_reviews.text: This seat has changed school for the better (and supper-time). My 7 year old is doing much better staying in his seat and being "still".
customer_reviews.author: dancelover

customer_reviews.title: really helped my daughter
customer_reviews.text: very helpful item - helped her stay seated in her chair! she is a very sensory seeking active kind of kid.
customer_reviews.author: ys

customer_reviews.title: Great for wiggly bodies!
customer_reviews.text: It really has helped my wiggly son stay seated while completing homework and eating meals. I love that it can be inflated or deflated for preferences and has 2 sides. My other 2 children want their own and my mother in law wants a few to keep for the kids at her house, as well!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for ADD
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my 9 year old daughter and it's made a huge difference. She would constantly be making noises and hoping out of her chair. Now she quietly sits and doesn't bother her neighbors. Plus it's good for her posture.
customer_reviews.author: Hutchmomma

customer_reviews.title: Made a noticeable difference
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son to bring into school. He said that he loves it and his teacher noticed improvement with his fidgeting and concentration. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with pump as advertised
customer_reviews.text: We were really looking forward to trying this after a recommendation from our child’s preschool teacher. Unfortunately, it arrived several days later than it said it would and then WITHOUT the pump that was pictured and described in the listing. Now I have to find a pump?! Ugh. We happen to be in the process of moving, so this is just not an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: somebody

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold air for very long. The air slowly leaks out over a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Beckova

customer_reviews.title: Nice if you get all the items
customer_reviews.text: Says pump included but we didn’t get one. It was missing.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Hiatt

customer_reviews.title: Great for ASD / ADHD kids of all ages
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to help kids stay focused whether in the classroom or virtual learning.
customer_reviews.author: Rene MacKenzie

customer_reviews.title: This is my second one for grand son.
customer_reviews.text: This works very well for my grandson and for the first time he is able to stay seated for meals and other activities. I ordered a second one for school. Works great and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: STL Kid

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this seat for my daughter to use when she is doing homework. She uses the same product at school. It seems to help her stay in her seat and stay on task. I am pleased with the quality of the product and my daughter likes to use it as well
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: It turned into a toy trying to keep it blown up like a balloon than it did something helpful
customer_reviews.text: The pin that holds the air in kept popping out. It turned into a toy trying to keep it blown up like a balloon than it did something helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Teacher is happy! My kid out of trouble in school!
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves it; and its serving its purpose, to remind him trough "sensory perception" to remain seating during class, and most importantly the teacher is very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Pao

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping this would work out but unfortunately it hasn't but only because it won't stay inflated, the valve cap is constantly popping out.
customer_reviews.author: Erika M Guzman

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Trying on my granddaughter who is easily distracted and has trouble with executive functioning. She is happy to try and used it today during class.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: ADHD kid benefits from this cushion.
customer_reviews.text: It mostly keeps my ADHD kiddo seated for dinner!! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: May not come with pump..
customer_reviews.text: This product seems like it may help alot. The reason for 1 star off is because it didn't come with a pump like it said it would. But its a nice thick durable feeling product!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice sensory cushion
customer_reviews.text: This sensory cushion is very well made. I can't get my son to sit on it for long just yet. We are still trying to find the right level of air. I think he is going to like it almost deflated
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped our 4 yo to sit "still" in class
customer_reviews.text: This product seems well made and has worked great for our purposes - to help our daughter be able to sit "still" and focus in class. She loves it and takes it with her from desk/table to circle time. The PreK teacher has been very happy with her ability to stay seated since we started using it.
customer_reviews.author: EC in WV

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the seat a few days ago. The box was missing the pump. Jason promptly resolved the problem. In addition to great customer service, we are also very pleased with the product. Most importantly my son loves his new seat.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S.

customer_reviews.title: My son uses this all of time in his PreK ...
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this all of time in his PreK class. He can use it in a chair or on the ground and get ll his wiggles out! It can even hold a 180 lb adult (or less). There is a very bumpy side and a lower bumpy side.
customer_reviews.author: Bea Nu

customer_reviews.title: I don't like to sit on them
customer_reviews.text: I am an elementary SpEd teacher. Personally, I don't like to sit on them. However, my students LOVE them. The only concern is they seem to lose air but a small pump is provided to add air.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product
customer_reviews.text: My Son thought it was cool but know he doesn't like it. He has a thing with texture so Im wondering if the grippy part bugs him.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Scheele

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for those who need a little extra help sitting still
customer_reviews.text: The product was shipped out super fast!! My son with special needs who has a hard time sitting still loves to use his spiky seat!! The materiel used is very durable!! This seat has helped my extremely active little boy to sit still during meals!! Very good buy for us!!
customer_reviews.author: Amnda Sapp

customer_reviews.title: She is 6 and likes to move around as she works but does not find this wiggle seat very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter. She is 6 and likes to move around as she works but does not find this wiggle seat very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not Bright Pink
customer_reviews.text: I gave it an overall 3 because the color is a baby pink.... Not bright pink like in the photo. The durability is good so far haven’t used it enough to give more info.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Goetz

customer_reviews.title: Love our wiggle seat!!!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE our wiggle seat! My son uses it everyday in class and we couldn’t live without it! Customer service at Sensory solutions is so responsive to questions and requests, making this the only brand I’ll buy! 😊❤️
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Hall

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! My son actually sits now. I didnt mark off a star because I dont actually know how full this thing is supposed to be. Babies love to sit and waddle on it and crawl over it this is an everyone pleaser!!
customer_reviews.author: Mollie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem to help long-term
customer_reviews.text: My son does not seem to benefit from it now that the excitement has worn off.
customer_reviews.author: deanna

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product.my daughter always got up during homework time and now after we got this seat she doesn't.I purchase a second one so she can use at school.I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked it but my grandson not so much. He won't sit on it. :(
customer_reviews.author: Krissy D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Totally recommend this cushion. My son has ADD the attentive kind and also some sensory issues. He now sits down and eats without getting up 10 times to move around. Also, bought one for school. He really loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: #3boys!!!

customer_reviews.title: I bought this seat for my daughter because her teachers ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this seat for my daughter because her teachers were complaining that she moves around in her seat at school a lot. We thought that the Wiggle Seat would help her. We have only used it at the dinner table at our house (for homework time) and she says that she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: MomofthreeandSLP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My son doesn't sit for long periods, so far he seems to really like sitting on it and will during dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin L

customer_reviews.title: The seats are great! I got them for my kindergarteners and they've ...
customer_reviews.text: The seats are great! I got them for my kindergarteners and they've been explore them more and more. My only complaint is that the plug is way too easy to pull out. My twins figured it out right away and they have been unplugging their seats at school. I'll have to find a way to keep them in without making it too difficult to inflate the seat again if it loses air.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Seat
customer_reviews.text: My son can not sit still he loves this seat. It does help him from wanting to get up and move all the time. He has one in school and at home.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Great seat for my son
customer_reviews.text: Great seat for my son...he is 6 and has autism and adhd... really good quality also. His occupational therapist also has the exact same one (we found out after) and she raves about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: it has done an amazing job helping
customer_reviews.text: Although it has not fixed homework time 100%, it has done an amazing job helping! I never thought anything so unique and simple as what she was sitting on could help her focus. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is what we require for our 9 year old being school, Easy to inflate comfortable to.child.
customer_reviews.author: thrashdog

customer_reviews.title: Increased focus
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my very social 7 1/2 year old son. He is always trying to see what everyone else is doing in class and has some difficulty staying focused. He has been using it about 1 1/2 weeks. He and his teacher have told me that it is helping him to stay more focused!
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Helps to keep my son seated at school
customer_reviews.text: My son has ADHD and the teachers said the seat has helped keeping him seated, and the product is a durable material!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great to use for kids with sensory needs or difficulty focusing and sitting still. My son uses it when doing his homework.
customer_reviews.author: SMB

customer_reviews.title: my 4 year old grandson likes to sit and kneel ...
customer_reviews.text: my 4 year old grandson likes to sit and kneel on his wiggle seat. but it did not have the results we were hoping for. he still jumps around while eating at the table.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbs's Mom

customer_reviews.title: My only complaint is how easy the plug is to pull out - my son ...
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is how easy the plug is to pull out - my son immediately pulls it out every time we go to use it. My daughter leaves it alone and loves the seat - helps her focus better during meal time!
customer_reviews.author: cspach

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this for my son who is in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son who is in the 2nd grade. We purchased this in October, and already it has a hole in it. I don't believe these products are made to last.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene M.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product has made a huge difference in my classroom! I had one child that could not sit through group times or meal times, and his constant movement interrupted learning for everyone. Now the child gets the movement he needs while attending to group time activites!
customer_reviews.author: Teach4change

customer_reviews.title: Hyper child?
customer_reviews.text: Had problems with my grandson staying in his seat in kindergarten. Teacher reported this has made a world of difference!
customer_reviews.author: rlee's gma

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It kept deflating. It was never over inflated. Not sure what was the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The product isn’t made well and I’m disappointed in how fast it deflated
customer_reviews.author: Devynn D

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice to know about how much air should be in ...
customer_reviews.text: There aren't any instructions for inflating/deflating it, so we inflated it too much. We figured out that we needed to put the "needle" back into the air hole to deflate it, but it's a slow process to letting air out. Would be nice to know about how much air should be in it for it to work the way it needs to work for helping my son sit comfortably and get the sensory input he needs.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Livingston

customer_reviews.title: no pump!
customer_reviews.text: Are box did not come with a pump. The box was also managed and destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: Jason bittick

customer_reviews.title: My 18 year old autistic son seems to like it and it seems to help him focus
customer_reviews.text: My 18 year old autistic son seems to like it and it seems to help him focus, but it's too early to tell.
customer_reviews.author: J. T. G.

customer_reviews.title: Instead of tipping the chair he just wiggles his hips and does his homework much better and us more focused on finishing it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son who has ADHD to help focus when doing homework and it works wonders. Instead of tipping the chair he just wiggles his hips and does his homework much better and us more focused on finishing it!
customer_reviews.author: T.Mckown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful for a young man who couldn't keep his chair legs on the floor at school.
customer_reviews.author: Sample Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great for helping my daughter sit still at dinner
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great customer service on a minor issue!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Guttenberg

customer_reviews.title: This worked out great for one of my students
customer_reviews.text: This worked out great for one of my students. Be careful not to over-inflate. Initially I put too much air in it for him and the Occupational Therapist and I eventually figured out how to squeeze some air out.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Item exactly as described. Seems durable so far. My 6 and 8 year old boys are using it for school work and it seems to be making a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: My kiddo has autism. It's always in his chair ...
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo has autism. It's always in his chair. My 2 year old daughter likes to stand on it. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: mica

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it. He uses it at the ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. He uses it at the dinner table and takes it to daycare for circle time. We will probably purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: H. Guin

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Deal and fast shipping you know issues my son loved this ! I ordered another one as well
customer_reviews.author: DeBrango

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wiggly ADHD kiddos!
customer_reviews.text: Homework isn't so bad anymore with something to sit and wiggle on with his active on the go ADHD! Sanity saver for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: REH

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: Actually keeps my daughter (7yrs old) sitting still in her chair.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Holmes

customer_reviews.title: I would 100% recommend at least trying it
customer_reviews.text: My baby has a very hard time sitting still. She says "it is just too hard". I saw this and decided to try it. She is 4. She is a little smaller than average. It fits perfectly on all her chairs. If she sits without it she quickly says she wants to get her wiggle chair. She has told me several times it is helping her feel calm. I also noticed she is still and her back is straight. Her writing has also greatly improved while she practicing writing since she isn't all over the place. She uses it un her classroom and at meals. I would 100% recommend at least trying it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Norton

customer_reviews.title: I decided to get one for home and it works great keeping him in his seat during homework and meals
customer_reviews.text: My son uses one at school and it seems to help him stay in his seat usually. I decided to get one for home and it works great keeping him in his seat during homework and meals.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Keeps my hyperactive son some what more focused in class.
customer_reviews.author: Emmie

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kids with ADHD and Sensory Processing Disorder
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this seat. I bought her one for school and it has done wonders for her!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my daughter needed to stay sitted. She loves it and it makes eating meals a lot easier at home
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I would just like ro get the color i ordered.
customer_reviews.author: alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Great for ADHD/sensory seeking kids
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old really loves this seat. He just wishes the red was less pink.
customer_reviews.author: JLeo

customer_reviews.title: Useful and helpful
customer_reviews.text: All of us (children and adults) have liked to use this. Our son can sit without swinging the chair all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Petra

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Has made the most noticeable change while we ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Has made the most noticeable change while we are eating which is great. For homework, his butt is on the chair, but his feet are still not on the floor. Better results than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cote

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Actually helps my eight year old grandson focus in school
customer_reviews.author: Charles V. Mauro

product_meta.title: Wiggle Seat for Sensory Kids - Inflatable Wobble Cushion with Pump - Flexible Alternative Seating for School, Office, Classroom Furniture, and Home
product_meta.description:
Color:Blue“Sit down! Sit still!”
How many times have you had to say that? It’s said in the classroom, at the dinner table. And it can get frustrating

Some kids just need to fidget to focus

INTRODUCING - The Sensory Solutions Wiggle Seat! The Comfortable, Functional, Inflatable Wiggle Wobble Cushion Kids Love!

🧒SKILLS THROUGH MOVEMENT
When children wiggle they build strength, develop motor skills and more. Our wiggle seats can help calm them to focus. Great for hyperactive kids with SPD, ADHD and can also help children with autism

🚶PROMOTES PERFECT POSTURE
A strong core means better posture. And better posture means less back strain. Use our wiggle cushion as kids seating at home or classroom. Turns old seats into comfort-first wobble stools to sit and walk tall

👪FIDGET FUN FOR EVERYONE
Not just for kids! Working for hours at a desk is a lot more comfortable sitting on a soft, squishy stability cushion. Or use in workouts that require balance pods for muscle toning and physical therapy. Great for seniors

💪MADE STRONG, MADE SAFE
Certified safe for children 5 years and older. Latex and Phthalate free. Perfect and safe addition to your special education supplies

Perfect For:
Home
School
Exercise
Travel

*Also makes THE most comfortable office chair cushion!

Fidgeting Features:
Measures 13" x 13" x 3"
Weighs 1.95 lbs

*Inflatable cushion air pump included to customize your balance cushion comfort

🪑GUARANTEED SATISFACTION
If you aren’t 100% happy with your wiggle seat we’ll refund you in full no questions asked

Click ADD TO CART to take a seat and get moving!
feature_bullets: MOVE TO LEARN - Because sitting still can be hard for a kid! Movement can help keep them engaged. The Sensory Solutions wiggle seat is the sensory seat cushion for kids who need that extra fidget to focus

CORE FOCUSED - Improves coordination and helps children strengthen their cores and back muscles. Makes great classroom seating! Turns regular classroom furniture into wiggle seats for sensory kids. Perfect for ADHD kids and adults

POSTURE PERFECT - Measures 13"x13"x3. Turn any seat into a dedicated wobble board kids will love. Two different balance pad textures for longer lasting calm, better posture and wobble cushion comfort levels

DIFFERENT USES - No kiddos? Also works great for adults! Use it in core muscle stability disc workouts, balance disc fitness routines or turn your office seat into a sensory chair for desk work. Latex, Phthalate Free. Inflatable seat cushion air pump included

GUARANTEED - Durable. Made to last a lifetime of fidgeting and wobbling. But if you aren’t 100% satisfied with your wiggle seat, we’ll refund you in full. Don’t just sit there, click ADD TO CART and sit better
